'Allo, 'Allo!


Welcome to sgProtractorTools demo application.

This application offers example content and functionality to be tested with the sg-protractor-tools. Run tests with grunt protractor. Look at the *.spec files in the test/e2e folder on how to use sgpt in your protractor tests.

Scroll

Scroll elements into visible area

Resize

Set the browser or viewport size during protractor tests

Memory

Measure memory consumption during test cases and detect memory leaks

DOM

Wait until elements get visible before your test continues. Or until an elements becomes invisible

Mouse

Perform drag and drop with ease

Console

Test for console errors in the afterEach() method
